external_references.source_name: Trend Micro Mustang Panda Earth Preta Toneshell February 2025
external_references.description: Nathaniel Morales, Nick Dai. (2025, February 18). Earth Preta Mixes Legitimate and Malicious Components to Sidestep Detection. Retrieved September 10, 2025.

objects.description: [TONESHELL](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1239) has injected its malicious payload into a running process through Windows utility Microsoft Application Virtualization Injector `MAVInject.exe`.(Citation: Trend Micro Mustang Panda Earth Preta Toneshell February 2025)
